description:
Make your Tacx Neo training sessions more immersive than ever. With the Neo Motion Plates, you get to feel the rhythm of your rides. The base allows your Tacx Neo to glide forwards and backwards with your effort, so you can enjoy the subtle sway of a long climb, or the dynamic movement of a sprint.

  • Compatible with all versions of the Tacx Neo trainer
  • Plates and riser block both move forwards and backwards about 5cm
  • Near silent movement
  • Tool-free installation – there are even integrated holders for your Neo’s rubber feet
  • Compact design gives you more functionality, without taking up more space
  • Dynamic riser block supports tires up to 20mm wide
  • Dimensions: 58.2 x 12.2 x 10.2cm
  • Note – Motion Plates are side specific and directional, but there are arrows, so installation is easy
  • In the box: Neo Motion Plates, dynamic riser block, and the manual
name: Tacx Neo Motion Plates
